## Command.icon property

Icon ID to be used in the toolbar. See [https://docs.md/Plugins/User+interface/Icons](https://docs.md/Plugins/User+interface/Icons) for available icons and how to add your own.

**Signature:**

```typescript
icon?: IconName;
```
